column2: Assertive and freedom-loving with a strong need for independence. Others may call this headstrong, but simply believes that everyone has a right to assert themselves in any situation. Life presents many challenges which are enjoyed meeting head-on regardless of the obstacles along the way. Natural-born leadership. The ability to focus on one's own goals to the exclusion of others is a healthy trait, but like all things a balance is needed, and must make sure to take the time to include others' points of views and approaches. On the whole though handles oneself with aplomb emphasizing the strengths rather than the weaknesses.

Reliable and solid with a strong need for stability, routine and security. Approaches life in a methodical manner preferring the tried and true pathways of familiar territory. In fact the adventures of unexplored territories fill with feelings of foreboding and can be quite stubborn in refusal to leave secure surroundings. Much energy is spent on making the world secure. For this reason appreciated for reliability and ability to provide a safe haven for others. Tradition appeals, and therefore often seen as a stalwart in society, taking on the more conventional roles. Down-to-earth nature also means literally enjoying the fruits of the earth. Also enjoys the sensation of textures and tastes, often indulging in the comforts and delights of the sensual side of life.

Curious, lively, versatile and talkative, with a need for constant stimulation. Adept at keeping finger on the pulse of several things at once, like a juggler. Many times weaves way successfully and skillfully through many activities leaving others in somewhat breathless awe of abilities. However, there are also many times when everything comes tumbling down and left to pick up the pieces which have been scattered throughout life. Communication is a key element in life, taking the form of lively conversation, letter writing, study, numerous telephone calls or even traveling to various destinations to satisfy curiosity. Tendency to liven up even the quietest environment, sometimes even introducing a chaotic element. Life is never dull.

Caring and nurturing with a strong need for family and comfort. Like the crab may appear to have a tough outer shell but vulnerable underneath and will withdraw into shell and home if feeling threatened. This withdrawal can happen quite often as strong emotional reactions occur. These strong emotions can be directed positively into caring for and protecting others, particularly family and loved ones. When feeling an emotional equilibrium enjoys giving to others, sharing warm and loving moments, and also enjoys own company. In particular though yearns to look after those loved, nursing them through illness, cooking a favorite meal or curling up in front of a fireside alongside them with a good book. Strong home-making urges, and home will be a great source of comfort to friends and family.

Good-hearted, and has a sunny personality which shines in the company of others. In fact loves an audience, basking in the attention which comes with being center stage. Most of the time does manage to attract the attention that is so keenly sought, as enthusiasm and sense of fun has a contagious effect lighting a spark of fun and joy in those around. Generous nature also means willing to share abundant goodwill with others. May also find oneself surrounded by children ready to join playful games, for adept at bringing out the child in everyone. Emphasizes the positive sunny aspects.

Analytical with a keen mind, and will enjoy paying attention to detail. In fact enjoys anything which requires close analysis ranging from pastimes such as mind-bending puzzles to more demanding work such as cataloguing data and scientific research. Excels in areas that demand concentration, organization and rational thought. Loves order, particularly in daily life. This can include anything from an organized household to a properly-planned social calendar. Loved ones will often rely on organizational abilities, and these qualities may extend into working life where others will come to appreciate executive abilities.

Strives to live a life of peace and harmony. This need for balance can be seen in all areas of life, but particularly in personal relationships which play such a strong part in life. Justice and fairness in interpersonal relationships are all-important. Can always see both sides of the story and therefore often finds oneself in a peace-making or mediating role. Diplomatic, and therefore carries out these roles well. However, make sure not to lose sight of own objectives in efforts to help others feel at ease. There can be a tendency to become so embroiled in the problems of others and in efforts to make others feel at peace, that forgetting about oneself occurs. Artistic appreciation, and perhaps artistic talents, will feature in life.

Passionate and intense, who likes to experience life at a very deep level. None of the superficial skating over life's surface. Likes to penetrate life's mysteries and the intricacies of personal relationships. Demands an intimacy and honesty in life that can be challenging to others. In fact excellent counselor as insightful and not frightened of tackling the minefield of emotions which surround subjects such as death, sexuality and metaphysical experiences. Also resourceful, in particular in financial matters. Often knows the right place to search for information, or the right person to approach.

Sunny and optimistic, with a love of adventure. In fact adventure plays a key role in life, whether it be literally traveling around the globe, or metaphorically speaking exploring the world of ideas and philosophy. Particularly enthusiastic about anything that expands the world and helps forget about daily chores. Religion, law, sport, philosophy, academia, and ethics are just some of the many areas which provide a gourmet of ideas for exploration. For these reasons also likely to be attracted to people from foreign lands, who help to give a fresh and different perspective on life. Also enjoys setting goals, as looking forward to a new vision provides excitement.

Serious and responsible with a strong awareness of the 'right way of doing things'. Has the ability to work steadily and honestly towards achieving ambitions in life. Others grow to respect reliable and steadfast personality, particularly as growing older. In fact, the people in life come to rely on ability to remain calm and detached in times of crisis. Mostly, enjoys this role, perhaps even unconsciously adopting a superior attitude to those less calm and sedate. Ambitious, and enjoys working long hours to methodically and patiently achieve objectives, as long as considering the goal worthy of attention. Indeed has the ability to work through a mountain of work, and eventually get to the top, through patience and an ability to create structure.

Unconventional, friendly, unpredictable and innovative. Anything new and original will appeal, particularly if it goes against convention. Likes to test ideas that have never been thought of before. At best this can be an exciting quest into unexplored territories. It can, however, be an indiscriminate rebellion against tradition. Not that will mind, for strong believer in people having the freedom of individual expression and not being oppressed by society's expectations. A regular livewire, has an electric quality about personality, which makes it difficult to sit still for long and also makes attractive to people from all walks of life. In fact prefers to mingle with groups of people, often adopting the adage 'the more the merrier'. May also enjoy working in a group which fights a particular cause.

Imaginative and serene with a strong wish to be allowed to live in a world where harsher realities fade into the background and the dreamier aspects come into focus. Very talented, and it is indeed important to find a channel for all creative energies, otherwise finds oneself slipping into a world of unreality and apathy. May even find oneself drawn to the world of drugs as a form of escapism. Important to set aside time each day for meditation, quiet time or artistic pursuits. Quiet activities such as sitting on a beach or listening to soothing music may appeal, in fact any activity which suits gentle nature. May find oneself drawn to the mystical or spiritual side of life, in particular pastimes or studies which develop intuition and understanding of the sacred side of life.

Emotional need for action and independence. Under stress seeks challenge and time alone, away from other people. May have experienced mother as independent and possibly impatient. Go-getter tendencies.

Ability to meet emotional needs or find others who help. Emotional need for stability and steady routines with preference to maintain these as much as possible. May fear change, preferring the safety of the known rather than the unknown. Emotional duress can lead to indulging in overeating, retreat from the world and perhaps even sins of the flesh. However, underlying practicality helps overcome bad habits and find ways of dealing with the world. Although practical, may also be creative and hence find release through massage therapy, interior decorating, cooking, the arts and music.
Basic need for mental stimulation. Curious and seeks answers to many questions. Talkative nature. May have called upon mother to provide stimulation and activity.
Needs nurturing. Under stress may want to retire to the comfort of home. Forms strong bond with mother. May have difficulty breaking away from home later in life.

Loves to be the center of attention. Not necessarily liking to be on stage in front of lots of people, but liking to take center stage in the lives of loved ones. Wants to play, and knows all the tricks of the trade when it comes to getting others to join. This can make for delightful company. When life gets tough likes to play in order to lighten up the situation. Parties, festivals, picnics and other fun events are the food of life.
Strong link between emotions and the body. Need for perfection. May become ill when under stress. Mother may be critical or a perfectionist. She provides structure and order.
Need for harmony and peaceful surroundings, and seeks peace when under stress. Mother may be social and harmonious.

Emotional intensity and strong need for drama. Under stress creates drama and intensity in life. May have been born when mother experienced a crisis, or birth may have been traumatic. Mother may have been possessive and intense.
Emotional need for adventure and independence, and instinctual urge for travel and exploring. Under stress wants to go on an adventure. Mother may be seen as fun-loving and independent.
Feels secure when life is structured or when working hard. May be emotionally distant or cold. Mother's love may be limited in some way. Mother may have been strict or cold.
Feels secure with intellect rather than emotions. May be aloof from emotions, or distrust emotions as irrational and unpredictable. May have viewed mother as emotionally erratic.
Feels emotions deeply. May seek reclusion when under stress. Strong empathy with mother, and needs to learn emotional boundaries.
Independent thinking. Quick speech and generation of new ideas. Flashes of intuition may occur.
Importance placed on traditional knowledge. Learning occurs in a slow, methodical and hands-on manner. Adherence to old ideas and potential fear of learning new concepts.

Love of conversation and information. Fast talking with a tendency to collect and network knowledge and data. Enjoyment of books, letters, magazines, media, computers and other tools for learning and communication.

Importance placed on communication within the family. Information about family and background holds significance. May include collecting family photos or studying family history. Care for self and others through communicating emotional issues.
Enthusiastic quest for knowledge. Pride in learning abilities and belief that learning is enjoyable. Tendency toward know-it-all behavior.

Discriminating mind with critical and analytical capabilities. Potential obsession with detailed knowledge. May be detrimental in daily life but beneficial for research. Preference for precise communications.

Diplomatic and peacemaking nature, often acting as a go-between in relationships. Good communication skills that put others at ease. Arguments cause upset due to preference for harmony in communications.
Effective use of resources. Tendency to delve into the core of matters rather than superficial knowledge. Potential for worry. Intense communications.

Seeking knowledge to expand worldview. Natural philosophical inclination with enjoyment of information that provides the big picture. May include religious debate. Importance placed on freedom of speech and thought.
Wise and careful thinking. Importance placed on credibility and authority. Seeking knowledge that carries authority. Cautious approach to new ideas.
Abundance of original and unique ideas. Enjoyment of exchanging ideas with others, particularly friends and groups. Inventive thinking with potential rebellion against old and traditional ideas.
Highly intuitive with good imagination. Ability to tune into others' thoughts. Difficulty distinguishing reality from fantasy. Periods of disappearing into a dream world before returning to reality.
Pursues partners ardently and hastily, yet strives for freedom and independence once in intimate relationships. Likes to be the initiator in relationships and can be aggressive. May be a spendthrift.
Romance and reliability go hand in hand. Approaches relationships slowly and steadily, looking for someone who will prove solid and secure. Enjoys sensuality and is reliable with finances.

Curious and flirtatious, enjoys intellectual relationships with exchanges of ideas. Communicating within relationships is important. Can be restless and sometimes gets bored. May have many money-making schemes.
Places emphasis on family relations. Forms strong emotional bonds within own tribe. May have an emotional need for financial security.
Enjoys fun and creativity within relationships. Takes great pride in partner. Also values appearances and may be proud of possessions.
Seeks meaningful relationships with a practical basis. Wants partner to be precise, neat and punctual. May expect perfection. Enjoys having detailed analytical conversations.
Has a strong need for relationships. Requires relationships to be harmonious, peaceful, and creative. Enjoys having beautiful possessions.

Looking for a soul mate in life, not just a marriage partner, but someone who can share life at the deepest possible level. This is an intense need, and indeed intensity could be a key feature in relationships. Sexual intensity is also vital ingredient in primary relationships. Without this emotional and sexual intensity, relationships feel lacking a vital quality, and may even seek solace in another's arms.
Wants to share adventure with partner, ranging from sharing adventurous ideas to hiking in the mountains. May also enjoy relating with foreigners and dining out with partner at foreign restaurants.

Shy in relationships. Forms relationships slowly, but they are likely to be enduring. May not form close relationships early in life, but later will have solid and committed relationships. Responsible with money and possessions.
Enjoys unconventional and odd relationships, which give freedom to express individuality. Enjoys talking more than touching. Enjoys being in a group of friends.

Yearns to merge and be at-one with partner. In fact wants to be at-one with the universe. Also enjoys sharing inspirational activities with partner, ranging from listening to beautiful music to visiting an art gallery.
Strong drive to initiate activities. Spontaneous and likes to take risks. May also be rash and accident prone. Can be aggressive if thwarted.
Strong personal desires, although usually follows a reliable course of action in attaining those desires. Stubborn if opposed.
Likes to initiate ideas and spread information. Assertive, although can resort to evasive behavior.
Ability to fight for people or causes about which there are strong feelings. Particularly protective of family. When personally hurt, likely to retreat into shell.
Strong need to express personal creativity. May display dramatic and confident behavior, and likes to make an impact on surroundings. May also be arrogant.
Pursues personal desires in a practical and methodical manner. May be critical if opposed.
Strong desire for diplomacy and justice, and a strong creative urge. May become indecisive when opposed.
Passionate warrior. Dramatic, and may have strong sexual urges. May make a vengeful opponent.
Inspirational leader, and has a strong desire for exploration and adventure. May be single-minded in desires.
Pursues personal desires in a responsible and methodical manner. Strong ambitions, and may be domineering if threatened.
Fights for just causes. Unpredictable, but will probably be a group leader. May become rebellious when angry.
Strong drive for a spiritual path. Strong subconscious emotions, and highly intuitive. May resort to victim-like behavior when faced with a threatening situation or person.
Freedom-loving and a spontaneous seeker of the truth. Potential to be a philosophical or religious leader.
Persistent search for the truth. Ability to be a loyal and wise teacher. Strong desire for abundance.
Search for a constant exchange of information. Versatile student and teacher.
Strong urge to look after loved ones. May also be idealistic. May have a large family, or feel as though the world is family.
Benevolent, generous and fun loving. Enthusiastic search for creative expression. May also have a love of children.
Strong desire to be of service, and high religious or spiritual ideals. May also have an obsession with detailed perfection.
Strong concern for justice. Diplomatic teacher, and expresses spiritual values in relationships.
Intense search for the truth. Strong desires for sexual union and joint enterprises. Could be a transformative teacher.
Love of adventure, philosophy, study, religions, and foreign cultures. Could be an enthusiastic and inspirational teacher.
Integrity and traditional values. Also seeks professional status and recognition, and could be overly concerned with the letter of the law.
Seeker of the new and inspirational. Holds racially-inclusive values, and is a humanitarian.
Intuitive search for the truth. Champion of the underdog. Could be a spiritual or religious teacher.
Resourceful and capable of applying new methods in a practical manner. Lessons involve patience and self-reliance.
Slow but methodical worker with practical management ability. Also persistent.
Disciplined and logical thinker with the ability to organize details. Preference for straight talk.
May be emotionally inhibited and shy. May feel isolated within family, yet takes family responsibilities seriously.
Takes pride in work and has ability to build personal authority. Tends to work for recognition and power.
Hardworking, practical, and good at problem-solving. Concerned with rules and regulations. May follow a disciplined fitness routine and could work in the field of health.
Has the ability to create responsible and long-lasting relationships. Committed to both intimate and business partners.
Has intense commitment to work and joint enterprises. Resourceful and determined worker.
May be committed to higher education and have a strict moral code. Also an easygoing and optimistic worker.
Conservative and authoritarian with strong worldly ambitions. Responsible worker.
Has ability to work well in groups. Work is often original and innovative.
Compassionate and intuitive worker, although can be anxious and fearful. With this position may experience strong patterns to be worked through.
Initiative and spontaneity. Breaking down of old structures and the emerging of the new.
Tenacity to pursue new ways of society. Resources come into focus.
Focus on new forms of communication and networks. Original and inventive ideas may spring to life.
Nurturing ideas and adding the emotional component. Communication may be important, also the role of emotions. The traditional ways of communicating with loved ones may be changed.
Seeking the freedom of individual expression. True individual creativity becomes important, particularly through culture and the arts.
Focus on the practical details of humanity. Medical research, the balance between work and leisure, the links between mind and body come into focus.
Seeking new ways of achieving right relations. Breaking down of the old forms of relationships and the introduction of new. New concepts about justice.
Highly-charged emotions and transformation. Innovative ideas about change. Experience of upheaval.
Seeking and teaching new visions for humanity. Introduction of new concepts of philosophy, religion and ethics.
Introduction of new structures, possibly governmental or business structures. Consolidation of original ideas and practical building of new ways.
Capable of brilliant scientific discoveries. Original and inventive insight which benefits humanity.
Ability to delve into the unconscious and the hidden and work with intuition. New understanding of Earth's role in the Universe may be discovered.
Potential for spiritual pioneering. Risk-taking in exploring mystical realms. Pioneering in the arts.
Ability to apply spiritual values to money and resources. Practical about mystical insights. Beautiful art and objects reflecting the spiritual world.
Development of intuition and ability to learn, write, teach and disseminate compassion and spiritual understanding.
Potential psychic abilities. Spiritual beliefs held close to the heart with emotional attachment.
Close links with the creative arts. Pleasure and extravagance expressed in both artistic and spiritual worlds.

Faced with the task of analyzing excesses of extravagance and organizing a systematic approach to blending the spiritual and practical. Concerned with spiritual matters becoming part of daily routine. Regular attendance at church viewed as necessity for good healthy living.

Ability to view human relationships from a spiritual overall viewpoint rather than rules and regulations. Some confusion over right human relations may reign. Aim to achieve balance in human relationships. Concern with justice.

Ability to passionately pursue spiritual values. Battle between desire nature and desire for spiritual way of life. Knowledge of the value of regeneration rather than stagnation. Transformative role in the world.
Gift of spiritual vision. Ability to help humanity focus on spiritual goals and become more expansive and inclusive of differing races and beliefs.
Ability to apply discipline on the spiritual path. Wisdom to incorporate both old and new spiritual values to form firm foundation for future spiritual growth.
Ability to pursue new and different spiritual visions - the gift of revelation. Learning to live as a collective.
Potential ability to be at-one with God. Expression of spirituality through visions and art. Inspirational teaching with consciousness of wholeness.
Ability to overturn traditions and start anew. Revolutionary nature with capacity for initiating fundamental changes.
Ability to transform material production and monetary processes. Focus on economic change and restructuring of financial systems.
Transformative inventions and major breakthroughs in knowledge. Subject to new discoveries with worldwide ramifications.
Upheaval in social systems. Born into troubled times which threaten security and family. Ability to form new social concepts.
Ability to use power both positively and negatively. World power and leadership are important issues.
Ability to transform the way the world sees health. Focus on medical research, worldwide diseases, medical discoveries, and the links between mind and body.
Concerned with the cause of justice and transforming human relations. Ability to see the necessity for change in personal and global relations.

Ability to initiate change on a worldwide basis in order to rise above the basic desires of humanity. May experience conflict on a worldwide basis. Forced to learn the right use of the world's resources.
Experience the need to transform religious views to incorporate all philosophies and religions.
Change in world government. Ability to transform old structures into new and enduring ones.
Worldwide cooperation. Ability to make scientific breakthroughs for the benefit of humanity, and may be forced to change the way science is viewed.
Spiritual at-one-ment. Ability to break down traditional artistic forms to pave the way for new and spiritually infused art.

Frank, pioneering, headstrong and self-reliant. Likes to be first. Values challenges, particularly those that test physically and mentally. The challenge involves seeing ideas through to completion in any project, either independently or by ensuring that others can carry out the ideas. Also needs to restrain impulsive nature at times, to make sure that personal and other people's safety is not at risk.

Structure, stability and reliability are the cornerstones of life. Primary motivation is for security, in particular material security, achieved through practical feats. Likely to be a slow process towards successfully achieving purpose, because will not be hurried. In fact needs to be wary of becoming too fixed in comfort zone. The positive side of this tendency is that when committing to a course of action, can be relied on to come up with the goods.

Clever, cunning, intuitive and restless. Enjoying life at a fast pace with a flexible and adaptable approach to life, preferring to keep all options open rather than committing to one course of action. Primary motivation is stimulation, because hates to be bored. For this reason rarely settled in one place for long. Enjoys exchanging ideas with other people, whether it be through the spoken or written word. Communication is vital, and soon develops a strong desire for knowledge and expression to help overcome the dualities in life.

Caring for others is the major purpose in life. This could be caring for family and friends, extended family, pets, children or the elderly, or caring for humanity, or all of these. Impressionable, tenacious, hospitable, sympathetic and moody. Strong feelings, ranging from the most pure feelings of compassion to the most intense feelings of hatred. On the positive side life is motivated by the highest form of feelings motivating care for other people, and bringing both self and the other parties a sense of warmth and emotional satisfaction.

Sincere, generous and ambitious, enjoying a sense of autonomy in all activities. Adept at organizing life, and enjoys the independence. Generally speaking assured of purpose, and life is full and eventful. However, there are times when passion and haste lead to downfalls, and also has to be wary of the dictum "pride before a fall". Fortunately usually back on track quickly thanks to vital and sunny nature.

Quiet, reserved, retiring and receptive side to nature. Although not strongly ambitious does persevere to accomplish goals in life. Economical, thrifty, hygienic, tidy in body and mind. Order and precision are the preferred modes of self-expression, and likes other people to follow the lead. Intellectual ability could also feature strongly in life, perhaps through research.

Courteous, affectionate, thoughtful, modest and indecisive. Much of life's purpose is connected with relationships, both personal and professional. Human relationships are the primary motivation in life. Spends much time devoted to thinking about the needs and wishes of other people, ensuring that everyone is treating each other in a fair manner. For this reason purpose may be connected with justice, mediation or diplomatic work.

Shrewd, resourceful, perceptive, secretive, proud, and reserved. Fated to experience some battles in life, resulting in possible crises in emotional state, physical health or public status. The key to achieving true purpose is to act with integrity at all times. Strong will, which is best applied to achieving positive results.

Open-minded, honest, idealistic, jovial, impulsive and a deep thinker. Views life as a continual adventure with many exciting lessons, experiencing good fortune on travels. Irrepressible enthusiasm is irresistible, and others are keen to join the adventures. Ardent, affectionate, and kind-hearted. If can restrain impulses and harness positive traits then likely to be fortunate in life and an inspiration to others.

Ambitious, persistent, cautious, prudent and self-reliant. Responsibility and reserve often feature as first choice of self-expression. Approaches most things in life cautiously, making careful plans before starting anything new. A plodder, and takes life rather seriously. Ambitions are attainable through hard work and perseverance.

Gregarious and unconventional, original and objective. Independent, and yet purpose and fate are strongly linked with friends and associates, and groups of people. Associates can either help or hinder achieving purpose, depending on how quickly learns to assert self. Usually a good judge of character, but needs to learn to trust instincts. Purpose may be linked with humanitarian causes, or with metaphysical groups or pursuits. It's also possible that interested in scientific ideals.

Sensitive, impressionable, romantic, sentimental, imaginative, affectionate, kind, helpful and misunderstood. Sensitivity to other people and environment is both physical and emotional, possibly to the extent that possesses psychic or mediumistic gifts. Able to sympathize with other people, lending an understanding ear to their troubles and soothing their problems. Purpose may be linked with physical or emotional healing work.
Chooses professions that provide independence and autonomy. Assertion, power and initiative are shown publicly. Prefers to be a leader rather than a follower in chosen life direction.
Requires routine and stability in career, choosing a reliable and determined path. Attracted to traditional careers such as government roles or earth sciences.
Stimulation and activity are required in professional life. Communication is also important. Seeks recognition for intellect.
Needs a safe and secure profession, with caring for others often being key. Experiences strong emotions about public status.
Sense of self-importance is strongly linked with public status. Likes to shine in professional field. Has power, strength and leadership skills in profession.
Hardworking, critical and exacting in profession. Prefers order at work and likes to be recognized for high standards and detailed work.
Chooses professions for beauty, harmony and balance. Social skills are viewed as important in chosen path. Prefers a harmonious work environment.
Has an intense need for recognition in work. Ability to dig deep is brought to professional life, and may attract crises at work. Research and public resources often feature in chosen career.
Has an enthusiastic approach to career. Likes to be noticed publicly, and may have foreign connections in career.

Chooses a responsible and respectable career path. Prefers to be seen as authoritative and reliable. May experience some early career setbacks, but hard work will pay off in the end and will receive the respect desired.
Ingenious and original in chosen profession. May choose an unconventional career path. Wants to make a contribution to humanity. May change careers.
Serves humanity through career. May suffer through changes of profession and chase fantasies about life direction. May feel overwhelmed by career decisions.
